0: (CNN) She always referred to her students as "her kids." So even in death, Tammy Waddell is making sure they're taken care of. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Waddell, a teacher in Forsyth County, Georgia, lost a battle with colon cancer earlier this month. Two weeks before she died, she told her son that she didn't want flowers at her funeral. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Instead, she wanted people to bring backpacks full of school supplies for needy students. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR About 100 teachers were named honorary pallbearers at Waddell's funeral. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "This was just the kind of teacher she was, and this is
